snippet.title: HorrorVale - Pumpkin Panic 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Strange things are afoot in the spooky underworld town of HorrorVale, and it's up to Alice to get to the bottom of it and save her dog. 


Play Act 1 for Free now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1114650/HorrorVale/
https://alarkus.itch.io/horrorvale
https://gamejolt.com/games/horrorvale/366063

Welcome to HorrorVale, a world full of monsters, ghouls, and all sorts of fiendish undead.
Help Alice on her quest to save her dog from strange and unusual monsters who suddenly showed up in HorrorVale!

HorrorVale is a Spooky RPG where you explore the world, battle monsters, uncover mysteries, and meet wacky characters along the way. 
Don't worry about anyone you kill along the way, everyone is already dead!


For MORE information about HorrorVale and continued updates be sure to follow our twitter:
https://twitter.com/horrorvale
https://www.indiedb.com/games/horrorvale

Music by:
https://twitter.com/matthewrockvgm

And also subscribe for more HorrorVale related videos!
